options.name: Light Armored Fighting
options.description: Gain +1 Dodge and +1 Block while wearing Light Armor

options.name: Physical Defense
options.description: Gain +1 Physical Mitigation on all Light Armor

options.name: Elemental Defense
options.description: Gain +1 Elemental Mitigation on all Light Armor

options.name: Unencumbered Leather
options.description: Remove the Block and Dodge Penalties from Light Armor

options.name: Leatherworker
options.description: Gain +2 Smithing when crafting Light Armor

options.name: Improved Mitigation
options.description: Gain +2 Physical Mitigation on all Light Armor

options.name: Free Action : Quick Defense
options.description: You take the Defend Action by using a Free Action and gain an additional +1 Bonus to Defense Checks before the start of your next turn while wearing Light Armor.

options.name: Light Armor Expert
options.description: Gain +2 Elemental Mitigation and +1 Physical Mitigation on all Light Armor

options.name: Reaction: Reliable Dodge
options.description: When you take Damage, reduce it by half before calculating Mitigations.

options.name: Impact Protection
options.description: When you are hit by a Critical or Brutal Critical Hit, double your Physical Mitigation against the Damage.

options.name: Alternative Protection
options.description: Gain +4 Dark, Arcane and Divine Mitigation

options.name: Unburdened Dodge
options.description: Gain +1 Dodge and Immunity to the Prone condition

options.name: Glancing Blows
options.description: You gain a 1d4 Block and Dodge bonus against Projectile Attacks

options.name: Light Armor Master
options.description: Gain +2 Physical and +2 Elemental Mitigation while wearing Light Armor. Additionally, gain +1 Dodge, Block and Resistance.
